snippet.title: Amsterdam Museums and Galleries
snippet.description: Amsterdam » Museums. Amsterdam Museums. Museums in Amsterdam are among the main tourist attractions. The Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum, Anne Frank House and the Stedelijk Museum are the most popular choices, but there are many interesting small museums.

snippet.title: Amsterdam Museums: Which Museums in Amsterdam Are Must-See?
snippet.description: Most of the many museums in Amsterdam are serious stuff, but of course Amsterdam has a Sex Museum and a Hash Museum as well. This page lists those Amsterdam museums that are must-see.

snippet.title: Rijksmuseum - Het museum van Nederland - te Amsterdam
snippet.description: Claudius Civilis in het Rijksmuseum Meesterwerk Rembrandt tijdelijk te zien. Duik in de collectie Ontdek de collectie. Maak je eigen Meesterwerk

snippet.title: Amsterdam | Arts Holland
snippet.description: With the world's highest museum density, Amsterdam offers more than just picturesque streets and canals. A whole new Amsterdam unfolds when discovering high-level fashion design in the Red Light district or exploring the stunning Stedelijk Museum using augmented reality tours.

snippet.title: Museums in Amsterdam \- Holland.com
snippet.description: Amsterdam is home to numerous world-class museums. Learn more about the Van Gogh Museum, Rijksmuseum, the Anne Frank House and other museums in Amsterdam.

snippet.title: Museums & galleries | I amsterdam
snippet.description: Amsterdam is home to a variety of world-famous museums, including the Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum, or Anne Frank Huis, but there's so much more to see. From museums about cats or an amazing collection of handbags to photography and archeology, Amsterdam has it all.

snippet.title: Amsterdam Museums: Guide to Museums in Amsterdam, Netherlands
snippet.description: Find out more about Amsterdam museums. This guide to museums in Amsterdam, Netherlands serves as an ideal introduction to travellers intending to visit the Dutch capital.

snippet.title: List of museums in Amsterdam \- Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
snippet.description: This is a list of museums in the Dutch capital of Amsterdam: The Allard Pierson Museum The Amsterdam Museum The Anne Frank House The Joods Historisch Museum The Nederlands Filmmuseum The Stadsarchief Amsterdam Museumwoning Tuindorp Oostzaan Tropenmuseum Verzetsmuseum Ajax Experience Allard ...

snippet.title: Amsterdam Museums \- Art Museums, History Museums in Amsterdam
snippet.description: Amsterdam's museums rank among the city's most popular visitor attractions, especially "the big three" (Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum and the Anne Frank House Museum).

snippet.title: Amsterdam Museums \- Amsterdam Tourist Guide
snippet.description: Amsterdam museums \- Full information on museums and galleries in Amsterdam
